description: This file contains unit tests and smoke tests for the React component 'App' and its core game logic functions related to a Tic Tac Toe game. It tests initialization, move validation, winner detection, draw condition, and UI rendering.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Determines the winner ('X' or 'O') based on the current board state, or null if no winner.

methods.name: initBoard
methods.description: Initializes and returns a fresh Tic Tac Toe game board as an array of 9 nulls.

methods.name: isDraw
methods.description: Checks whether the current board state is a draw, i.e., full with no winner.

methods.name: validateMove
methods.description: Validates whether a move at a given index is valid (within bounds and not occupied).
